standard.description: These are standards to maintain Accessibility.

test.test_name: Page JS should avoid focus events
test.query_clob:
with aap as (
          select case
                 when (lower(trim(javascript_code)) like '%focus%'
                        or lower(trim(javascript_code_onload)) like '%focus%') then 'N' 
                 else 'Y'
               end pass_yn,
               page_id,
               javascript_code,
               javascript_code_onload,
               created_by,
               created_on,
               last_updated_by,
               last_updated_on,
               application_id,
               build_option,
               page_mode,
               page_name,
	             workspace
          from apex_application_pages
    )
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses inaccessible focus event', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses inaccessible focus event', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       aap.javascript_code,
       aap.javascript_code_onload,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Avoid affecting or using focus events with Javascript as it can impact the accessibility of your page.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  3.2.1(A) : On Focus : When any user interface component receives focus, it does not initiate a change of context.
